title: How Scientists Know The Approved COVID-19 Vaccines Are Safe
content:
1. How Scientists Know The Approved COVID-19 Vaccines Are Safe  ScienceAlert
  2. New UK COVID-19 vaccine recommendations say 'it is reasonable' for people to mix and match different shots, even though there's not yet evidence that works  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Britain Opts for Mix-and-Match Vaccinations, Confounding Experts  The New York Times
  4. Dr. Marc Siegel: COVID vaccinations will increase rapidly — greatest accomplishment in vaccine history  Fox News
  5. Update  Dr. John Campbell
